statements: SELECT * FROM billing_and_claims WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, billed_amount FROM billing_and_claims WHERE provider_id = 3 ORDER BY billed_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(billed_amount) AS max_billed_amount, MIN(paid_amount) AS min_paid_amount FROM billing_and_claims;
SELECT * FROM billing_and_claims WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM billing_and_claims GROUP BY provider_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM billing_and_claims WHERE paid_amount > 0 ORDER BY service_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, patient_id, billed_amount FROM billing_and_claims WHERE provider_id = 101 ORDER BY billed_amount ASC
SELECT MAX(billed_amount), MIN(paid_amount) FROM billing_and_claims WHERE patient_id = 201 GROUP BY provider_id
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) as claims_count FROM billing_and_claims GROUP BY provider_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY claims_count DESC
SELECT AVG(billed_amount) as avg_billed_amount, AVG(paid_amount) as avg_paid_amount FROM billing_and_claims WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM billing_data;
SELECT patient_id, claim_date FROM billing_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT provider_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, diagnosis_code FROM claims_data ORDER BY diagnosis_code ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_data WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM billing_data WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, provider_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000;

SELECT billing_data.id, billing_data.patient_id, billing_data.claim_amount, claims_data.diagnosis_code FROM billing_data INNER JOIN claims_data ON billing_data.claim_amount = claims_data.claim_amount;
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount, MIN(claim_amount) AS min_claim_amount FROM claims_data;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM claims_data GROUP BY provider_id HAVING total_claims > 5 ORDER BY total_claims DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_data;
SELECT patient_id, claim_amount FROM billing_data ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM provider_data WHERE provider_location = 'New York';
SELECT claim_id, investigation_status FROM fraud_data WHERE fraud_detection_status = 'Detected';
SELECT * FROM billing_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM billing_data ORDER BY billing_date DESC, claim_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM provider_data WHERE provider_location = 'New York';
SELECT claim_id, fraud_detection_status, investigation_status FROM fraud_data WHERE fraud_detection_status = 'Detected' ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_location FROM provider_data WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT bd.patient_id, bd.claim_id, bd.claim_amount, pd.provider_name, pd.provider_specialty FROM billing_data bd INNER JOIN provider_data pd ON bd.patient_id = pd.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM billing_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT claim_amount, billing_code FROM billing_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM provider_data WHERE provider_location = 'New York';
SELECT claim_id, provider_id, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, fraud_detection_score, fraud_status FROM fraud_data ORDER BY fraud_detection_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_data ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, patient_id ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT provider_name, provider_location, claim_date FROM provider_data JOIN claims_data ON provider_data.provider_id = claims_data.provider_id WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;

SELECT billing_code, claim_amount, provider_name, fraud_status FROM billing_data JOIN claims_data ON billing_data.claim_id = claims_data.claim_id JOIN provider_data ON claims_data.provider_id = provider_data.provider_id JOIN fraud_data ON billing_data.claim_id = fraud_data.claim_id WHERE fraud_detection_score > 0.8 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, provider_name ASC;

SELECT provider_name, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM provider_data JOIN claims_data ON provider_data.provider_id = claims_data.provider_id JOIN billing_data ON claims_data.claim_id = billing_data.claim_id GROUP BY provider_name ORDER BY total_claim_amount DESC;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM claims_data GROUP BY provider_id HAVING total_claims > 5 ORDER BY total_claims DESC, provider_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_data;
SELECT provider_name, claim_amount FROM billing_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM provider_data ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM provider_data WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, gender, health_condition FROM patient_data WHERE dob >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM billing_data WHERE provider_name='ABC Healthcare' ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, dob, health_condition FROM patient_data WHERE health_condition='Diabetes' ORDER BY dob ASC
SELECT provider_name, specialty, location FROM provider_data WHERE fraud_flag=true
SELECT patient_name, gender, dob FROM patient_data WHERE gender='M' AND dob < '1990-01-01'

SELECT cd.provider_id, pd.provider_name, cd.audit_result FROM claims_audit ca JOIN provider_data pd ON ca.claim_id = pd.provider_id JOIN claims_audit cd ON ca.audit_id = cd.audit_id ORDER BY pd.provider_name ASC
